alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Laurens; Montgomery; Telfair; Treutlen; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 9:46AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Laurens, southern Dodge, north central Telfair, southwestern Treutlen, northern Wheeler and west central Montgomery Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 946 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Five Points, or 8 miles southeast of Eastman, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... McRae, Eastman, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Helena, Glenwood, Milan, Rhine, Chauncey, Union, Landsburg, Cedar Grove, Jay Bird Springs, Five Points, Achord, Little Ocmulgee State Park, Godwinsville and Lowery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Laurens; Montgomery; Telfair; Treutlen; Wheeler
